author: vmassol
msg: Applied MPJBOSS-2 patch: Fixes jboss:shutdown and jboss:start hanging on pause. Thanks to Sean Timm.

author: vmassol
msg: Added assert:assertEquals tag to verify if two values are equal while testing a plugin. We probably need to use the jelly junit taglib soon or create a new one...

author: vmassol
msg: Added new maven.dashboard.report.showempty property. If set to false, the HTML report table will not contain entries for projects for which no aggregator data was retrieved. Asked by dIon.
